MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD7 postcode area of Selkirk. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.15pm to repair a faulty underground cable on Dovecot Park and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.33pm on Thursday 28th January 2021.
